QuestData.Title: Into the Night
QuestData.Description:
What we do this day, we do for Azeroth. For the countless souls lost to the Legion's foul crusade.
Once you are ready we will take the Vindicaar into the very heart of the Legion.
Argus awaits.
QuestData.LogDescription: Travel to Argus aboard the Vindicaar.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Prophet Velen aboard the Vindicaar on Argus.
